name: ClevelandFilmFestival
0:
”Alexa, ask the Film Festival what films are playing on April 9th, 2017”
”Ask the Film Festival to tell me more about California Typewriter”
”Ask the Film Festival what Women of the World films are showing on April 8th, 2017”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: film festival
des:
Film Festival is the perfect companion for fans of the Cleveland International Film Festival. It enables users of the popular Amazon Echo family of products to request film synopses, film times, categories, and general festival information using only their voice.

Tell me more about The Hero.
What World Tour films were showing on April 9th, 2018?
What films were screened on April 6th, 2018?
Get me information about Kings of Summer.
When does the festival take place?
What is Breaking Balls about?
Where is Tower City Cinemas?
How much are tickets?
When did California Typewriter play?
What's their phone number?
What categories of films are shown?
What films are playing on April 8th, 2018?
What movies were playing at night on April 2nd, 2018?
What does Patrick like?

We hope you enjoy using this new way of interacting with us!
